about_the_game:
It's you against WordSpiral for the highest score.

Find words on the WordSpiral to eliminate them from the game board.
Try to eliminate all the letters on the Spiral Board.
Watch the Spiral Board shrink after each word is found.
How many turns does it take to clear the board?
THEN - ask the WordSpiral AI to Solve the same board you just played and see how many words it is able to find.

Features:


  • Large word database: over 200,000 words
  • Easy to learn, hard to master
  • Enjoy exciting background music

    It’s you versus WordSpiral for the best word search score

    March 2023 - Challenge Mode introduced
    The WordSpiral Word Search game has been updated to introduce the new weekly Challenge Mode game. WordSpiral is where you connect neighboring letters on a game board to form words that are removed from the board. Each Sunday a special Spiral game board is released for players to compete against each other for the highest score. Play as many times as you wish during the week and watch the leaderboard.

    Check the website for more information.

    February 2023 - A new modernized Unity version has been released.
    The legacy version has been retired as new functionality will be integrated into the new modern version.


    *** See website for full play instructions ***
